actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture and the Secretary of the Interior to quitclaim retained rights to certain land in Orangeburg County, S. C., to the State superintendent of education of the State of South Carolina.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of Agriculture and the Secretary of the Interior to quitclaim retained rights to specified land in Orangeburg County, South Carolina, to the State superintendent of education of the State of South Carolina.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture and the Secretary of the Interior to quitclaim retained rights to certain land in Orangeburg County, S. C., to the State superintendent of education of the State of South Carolina.
